titles.title: A bill to require a pilot program on the earning by special operations forces medics of credits towards a physician assistant degree.
A bill to require a pilot program on the earning by special operations forces medics of credits towards a physician assistant degree.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Defense to conduct a pilot program for special operations forces medics to earn credits toward a master's degree of physician assistant.
